resources.string: Connect with your most identical personalities.
First! Create your profile and select everything that describes you best.
Next! Answer some interesting personality based questions to determine your type.
Finally! Find out the people who\'ve got the most similar personality as yours.
Stay in touch with the people you\'ve connected to in the past.

Nectus is an idea to connect people better. It aims to bring together people who share similar personalities through its intensive match algorithm. Our vision is to have a society where it is easier for people to connect to people they share a healthy bond with and thus promoting better friendships and relationships.
